title: CRITICAL MASS GRANADA
movementParagraph1: It is a cycling phenomenon that takes place every month in many cities around the world. Its purpose is to bring sustainable mobility into the public debate and improve cyclist safety, relying on the idea that there is greater safety in numbers.
movementParagraph2: Bike rides like Critical Mass, with hundreds of participants, were first held in Stockholm, Sweden in the 1970s. But the first events of the current wave of Critical Mass took place in San Francisco (USA) in 1992. At first, only 58 people attended, but in less than a year, there were around 500.
datePlaceText: The first Friday of every month at Jardines del Triunfo, 8:00 PM
appText: Download the app to see the mass location
footerEvent: First Friday of every month 20:00H Jardines del Triunfo
